mapper.insert: insert into lms_class (instructorID, active, className, description, days, tag, closeDate, entryCode) values (#{instructorID}, 1, #{className}, #{description}, #{days}, #{tag}, #{closeDate}, #{entryCode})
mapper.update: update lms_class set days=days+1 where id=#{id}
update lms_class set days=days-1 where id=#{id}
update lms_class set active=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select className from lms_class where id=#{id}
select instructorID, className, description, days, tag from lms_class where id=#{id}
select * from lms_class where instructorID=#{instructorID} and active=1
select * from lms_class where instructorID=#{instructorID} and active=0
mapper.update: update lms_class set totalStudent = ( select count(id) from lms_takes where classID = #{classID} and status="accepted") where id = #{classID}
